name: gear-up
caption: Gear Up

effect.short: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus} by one stage.
effect.full: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus} by one stage.

flavorText:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.
